item.description:
We will meet at Panera 2542 Albany Avenue, West Hartford, CT 06117
at 7pm in the back of the restaurant. You can buy a beverage or snack if you like when you come in and we will have tables in the back of the restaurant. We plan to have the meet up until 9pm and hope to have some lively conversations in Spanish.

The date has been changed as there is a German meet up group that meets every month on that Thursday and has for the past 3.5 years.

group.name: The Hartford Spanish Language Meetup Group

item.name: COFFEE AND SPANISH CONVERSATION
